product_name: Boardworks Shubu Raven Stand Up Paddle Board - 12' 6"
long_description: Matching the efficient displacement hull shape of the Raven hardboard, this is the perfect inflatable paddle board for touring, fitness, river running, racing and all-around paddling fun.
short_description: Matching the efficient displacement hull shape of the Raven hardboard, this is the perfect inflatable paddle board for touring, fitness, river running, racing and all-around paddling fun.
